dataList.dlg: This rope. Hold on tight. ... Or sink.
Sunrise. Time to start work. Work hard.
Mermaid fin jerky. Good nosh. What, not good enough for you?
Nights are good. Sunset comes, before night comes. Shadow covers my body. Covers my tattoos.
This... is shame. Engraved it myself, on my skin. Want to erase. But can't erase.
The Middle branded my tongue. My speech. So I cut them up. Cut up my brain and my tongue. Did it to myself.
This knot, called Desperate's Knot. Used in the Middle. Hard to undo.
Harpooneers kill Whale. Kill the Whale... and it'll be over. This voyage.
Never broke Captain's orders. Never. But no more. My way. Not her way. It's different now. Now... want to know my path.
(Sounds of whetting a harpoon and tying ropes to it)
It is time. Time to kill the Whale. To destroy the Whale-heart. Time to escape.
Rope. Knot tight.
Let's go. Let's kill.
Want me to tie knot again? Desperate's Knot?
Stab deep.
That one. Slowed. Easy target.
Aagh...
End of voyage. Nearing.
Miss the sunset... the shimmering... sky...
Did it. Job done.
Can't do it. Someone else can do better.
Killed everyone. Let's return. To ship.
No more heart beating. Even when all Whale hearts stop beating... to where I return?
Must build coffin. Send me away. Put me in the coffin. So at least my body... finds way back to Cathy. One day...
